== O que ser isso? ==
<s>Tatsumaki Senpuu-kyaku</s> <s>atéquitéquitûguêm</s> <s>Tsa Tsa Tsuge</s> <s>Protequetequetuguen</s> <s>tartarugem</s> <s>Daumtecodoseuhamburguer</s> <s>Papai Fred Krueger</s> <s>Tchep Tchep Tchuruguet</s>,<s>Mao Tse Tse Tuguem</s> <s>Trep Trep Trep Turugueit</s> <s>Atrás tem duguem</s> <s>Tatatacturugen</s> <s>Té-Té-Tugue</s> <s>Atátátátátsuruguêt</s> <s>Radã Tai Turu Guen</s> <s>Ratatetuguen</s> <s>Trek-trek-fucken</s> <s>Asfaz se fugen</s> <s>Tartartartartartaruguem</s> <s>Eu tenho um MUGEN</s> <s>Protequitequituruguen</s> <s>Attack Taturuguen</s> <s> Tati Tureque Tureque Teque Teque Tugem </s> '''Protektektektruguem''' é um ''golpe fatal'' realizado por apenas um seleto grupo de [[gay|lutadores]].
Sua primeira aparição foi no [[Street Fighter]], mas lógico que não demorou muito para outros seres do universo realizarem tal façanha.

== Mas como começou? ==
[[Arquivo:Spin-fail.gif|thumb|right|Um Tsa Tsa Tsuge aplicado com perfeição, nocauteando o oponente!]]
Começou como um dança nas pistas de Disco lá pelos anos 60 e 70 que se chamava Tissa Tissa Huge. A dança consistia em dar uma pirueta <s> gay</s> no ar usando toda sua força, as pessoas acertadas ficavam gravemente feridas algumas até morriam, por isso foi proibida na dança,  mas a técnica é usada até hoje em shows de patinação de gelo, filmes de [[Jackie Chan]], para criações de [[Chuck Norris]] e outros.

E foi sabendo disso e dominando a técnica com perfeição que [[Akuma]], um [[punk]] utilizando as habilidades do [[Hadou]] a aperfeiçoou para rodar <s> a bolsinha </s> mais rápido, porém era tamanha a velocidade que ele rodava e graças a seu problema de gagueira o nome saia  ''Tsa Tsa tsuge''. E foi ouvindo isso que [[Ryu]] e [[Ken]] passaram a chamar o golpe por esse nome ridículo.

== Variantes Idiomáticas, outros nomes para o Tsa Tsa Tsuge ==
[[Arquivo:Terry-risingtackle.gif|thumb|[[Terry Bogard]], [[burro|aquele que não aprendeu]] a fazer Tsa Tsa Tsuge direito que idiota]]
* AfeitêTsuruguen, antigo playland do [[Shopping Ibirapuera]], São Paulo
* Seu pai tem pulga ein? 
* Só faz os McNuggets 
* Racutituguen''(Rá-Cu-ti-tu-guên)'', barzinho no pé do Morro dos Prazeres
* Tataliúguen, usado por garotinhos de havaianas no fliperama.
* RATATATATARUGE (rá-tá-tá-tá-tá-rú-gueim)'', bares com flipers.
* Tátatoriúken , bares com mesas e com flipers.
* Atéquifuquem ''(A-té-qui-fú-kein)'' ou Atéquifuguem ''(A-té-qui-fú-gueim)'', em casas especializadas de fliper.
* Giratório, em locadoras com [[Super Nintendo]] de 1 real a hora, mas com dois controles é 1,50.
* Ataque da Tartaruga, nos flipers perto de zoológicos.
* Protequetequetuguen ''(Pró-té-qui-té-qui-tu-gueim)'', nos flipers em farmácias, postos de saúde, clínicas médicas e psiquiátricas.
* Rataquitequitudurê ''(Rá-tá-qui-te-qui-tu-du-rê)'', nos flipers de aldeias indígenas na [[Amazônia]] e tribos canibais na [[Argentina]].
* hadukiteKUden
* Papai qué fruta, nos flipers das fazendas do centro oeste e na Selva do [[Congo]].
* Vuadoro Girado, variante cultural do Afeganistão e do Piauí.
* Papépépuguem ''(Pá-pé-pé-pu-guein)'', variante de jogadores do Espírito Santo.
* Apréprenpruguem ''(A-pré-pren-pru-guem)'', dialeto somaliano.
* Ataquedascoruja'ein, em [[Sergipe]] - Capital da [[Macedônia]] do Sul.
* Atetetsurugui, nos flipers da [[Bahia]]
* Fantastic Project, por ratos de fliper usuários de LSD.
* Ratchatchá ''(Rá-tchá-tchá)'', usado por aquele seu vizinho que sabe todos os golpes de todos os personagens de Street Fighter.
* Prespresburguete : dialeto falado em algumas regiões de SP com ficha a 25 centavos.
* ATAKTEKTURUGER (Ataque Tech-Turúguer), de um dançarino exaltado vestindo quimono e faixa na cabeça, numa rave na [[Chapada dos Veadeiros]] - GO. 
* Ataquetaquetrugue ''(Ataque-Taque-Trú-Gui)'': Tradução Nipo-Tupiniquim
* Tati Tureque Tureque Teque Teque Tuguem : Utilizado pelo [[Treco, o narrador do Mundo Canibal]]
* Tatapurugui ''(Ta-ta-pu-ru-gui)'': Utilizado por [[acrianos]] e regiões periféricas de [[São José dos Campos]].
* Ataqueadúgui: Versão mais perigosa, pois, além do dano do Tsa Tsa Tsuge, o adversário também recebe um [[Hadouken|Adugui]].
* Ataquefredkrugui!: Versão executada por [[Freddy Krueger]].
* Papai Freddy Krueger: Versão executada pelo filho do [[Freddy Krueger]].
* Sôpaidofredkrugen (Sô-pai-do-fred-kru-gen), dialeto infernal, executado pelo pai do [[Freddy Krueger]].
* Trak Trak Trúguen: ''(Trák-Trák-tru-guen)'': Versão utilizada na parte Ocidental do planeta com moedas de 1 real que não estão mais em circulação, inspirado claramente nos 'Traks' de festas juninas e anexos.
* Eukeroketchup ''(Eu-que-ro-ke-ti-chu-pe)'' : Versão dos flippers com lanchonete e sandubão.
* Kantoketaohanbuger ''(Kan-to-ke-ta-o-han-bu-ger)'' : Idem acima...
* Macaco Tartaruga ou Macaco cheio de Pulga : Versão dos flippers do norte do pais.
* Tatsumaki Senpuu Kyaku: Versão não oficial, pouco usada e errada de se dizer Tsa Ts Tsugue
* Tcha Tché Tchu Gets: versão ninja, muito usada quando você esta feliz!É a versão mais lógica!
* Rodete: Nos Flipers de [[São Bernardo do Campo]].
* Tetsúga ou tetsúguen ''(Te-tsu-ga)'' : Versão muito usada nos flipers no nordeste do país
* Rodaatacaduguém ''(Roda-ataca-dugúem)'': Versão literal do ataque em alguém.
* Ah plah preah plaaah tshuguem : Usado para quem tem dentes grandes para frente como os do [[Ronaldinho Gaúcho]]. 
* Tcheco: abreviação da versão mineira "Tchec tchec tchuguem". 
[[Arquivo:Ken-spinkick123.gif|thumb|right|[[Ken]], o primeiro copião!!!]]
*Daiterazetturugue ''(Dai-te-ra-zet-tu-ru-gue)'' Versão de quem que complica o golpe para deixar o golpe mais importante.
*Tektekdugen ''(Teque-Teque-Duguen)'' Versão utilizadapor usuários do [[Gaia Online]] e seu simulador de avatares
* [[Roundhouse Kick]] - usado por [[Chuck Norris]]
* Hurricane Kick - versão pirata criada pelos [[americanos]] invejosos.
* Batatchecfujack (ba-tat-tchec-fu-jack) - a que [[Eu]] e [[Você]] usamos.
* Tektektorugen (téc-téc-turugen) - usado por quase todo mundo
* Ta Ta Tchurugui - Usado pelo [[Dava Jonas]] constantemente

== Tradução das palavras ==
Tsa Tsa Tsuge é basicamente um grito de dor de uma pessoa que esteja com o '''charuto no beiço''', '''pronto pra lustrar a porcelana''' entre outros adjetivos.
Quando algum lutador se encontra desta forma, não resta-lhe outra opção a não ser aplicar tal golpe letal rotatório.
Afinal, você lutador, o que você falaria em meio a uma luta em que se você não ganhar logo, você vai cagar nas calças???
[[Arquivo:Mate tsa.jpg|thumb|200px|right|[[Materazzi]] aplicando o Tsa Tsa Tsuge.]]
